body_html:
@fmassa Sure. I think the important question is whether or not we should allow indexing a Tensor using a variable backed by a long tensor. i.e. does this make sense (or alternatively, shouldn't be done)?

x = Variable(torch.LongTensor([0, 2]))
y = torch.randn(5, 5, 5)
y[x, ...]
body_text:
@fmassa Sure. I think the important question is whether or not we should allow indexing a Tensor using a variable backed by a long tensor. i.e. does this make sense (or alternatively, shouldn't be done)?
x = Variable(torch.LongTensor([0, 2]))
y = torch.randn(5, 5, 5)
y[x, ...]
body:
@fmassa Sure. I think the important question is whether or not we should allow indexing a Tensor using a variable backed by a long tensor. i.e. does this make sense (or alternatively, shouldn't be done)?

```
x = Variable(torch.LongTensor([0, 2]))
y = torch.randn(5, 5, 5)
y[x, ...]
```
